Episode.GuestStars: |Aida Turturro|Andy Taylor|Audrey Heffernan Meyer|Brett Cullen|Brian Sheppard|Camila Perez|Christina Rouner|Christine Spang|Daniel Marconi|David Mason|David Shumbris|Dennis Boutsikaris|Genson Blimline|George Deihl Jr.|Jim True-Frost|Jonathan Holtzman|Kecia Lewis|Laura Sohn|Lisann Valentin|Okwui Okpokwasili|Ryan Scott Thomas|Teddy Coluca|Tom Ashton|
Episode.Overview: A Blacklist case forces Liz to choose sides between Red and the Task Force. Red tries to calm a panicked Ilya Koslov, who believes he is under surveillance.
